title: Beyond Marginals: Learning Joint Spatio-Temporal Patterns for Multivariate Anomaly Detection
summary: This paper aims to improve multivariate anomaly detection by modeling time-varying non-linear spatio-temporal correlations in multivariate time series data, where anomalies may be indicated by the simultaneous deviation of interrelated time series from their expected collective behavior.
usefulness_reason: The title explicitly mentions "Spatio-Temporal Patterns" and the abstract further elaborates on "time-varying non-linear spatio-temporal correlations" in multivariate time series data. This is a direct and substantial match for the "Spatio Temporal" aspect of the query.
